<p>The workshop will cover the <strong>Unix shell</strong>, version control in <strong>git</strong>, and programming in <strong>Python</strong>.<br>It is free and open to researchers, staff, and students.</p><p>This workshop teaches c<strong>ore computing skills</strong> that will help you be <strong>more productive and effective</strong>. We will alternate short tutorials with hands-on practical exercises. Participants will be encouraged to help one another and to apply what they have learned to their own research problems.</p><p>See the workshop website for <strong>more details</strong>: <a href="https://lmu-osc.github.io/2024-08-01-LMU/">https://lmu-osc.github.io/2024-08-01-LMU/</a></p><p><strong>Instructors:</strong> Dr. Sonja Grath, Felix Henninger, Dr. Luisa F.
